citations.narrative:
The Record of Acquisition and Dogs and Cats On Hand (Form 7005) is not up to date to match the inventory of animals
on site. Several animals have been sold or donated but their date of disposition has not been recorded on the 7005 forms.
One male cat who was imported in 2022 is not listed on the 7005 forms. Two cats have been transferred off site for a
show loan but the 7005 form indicates that they are still present on site. Having accurate acquisition and disposition
records is critical to allow inspectors to track animals both born on the property and imported into the facility as well as
those leaving the facility. Correct by May 2, 2024 by ensuring that all required acquisition and disposition information is
recorded on the 7005 forms so that the records match the inventory of animals on site.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.75(a)(1) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
The Record of Acquisition and Dogs and Cats On Hand (Form 7005) is not up to date to match the inventory of animals 
on site. Several animals have been sold or donated but their date of disposition has not been recorded on the 7005 forms. 
One male cat who was imported in 2022 is not listed on the 7005 forms. Two cats have been transferred off site for a 
show loan but the 7005 form indicates that they are still present on site. Having accurate acquisition and disposition 
records is critical to allow inspectors to track animals both born on the property and imported into the facility as well as 
those leaving the facility. Correct by May 2, 2024 by ensuring that all required acquisition and disposition information is 
recorded on the 7005 forms so that the records match the inventory of animals on site. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
 n
